headline: Intel Says It’s an Open Question Whether to Break Up Company
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Intel Corp. Chief Financial Officer Dave Zinsner said that a formal separation of the company’s factory and product-development divisions is an open question that will be decided by the chipmaker’s next leader.
